Below some #COBie delivery for Historic Architectural Fabric Conservation to trial area presented by @cathy_dass w collaboration of industry and academic partners #DigitalConstruction #HBIM https://t.co/hLSs2kMdyo

@eabroken2020 @WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency The sooner the better - EA incompetence needs national exposure.  This Government Agency is not fit for purpose, fail to ensure safety of general public.  Monitoring of their license to operate landfills woefully inadequate; also management of floods.  Reactive, not proactive.

Environment officers are at Radipole Lake Weymouth working with Wessex Water to identify the type and source of a pollutant. With assistance from @DWFireRescue we have deployed a boom to try to absorb some of the pollutant and prevent further ingress. https://t.co/AZq2MGPbfA

Great to catch up with @EmmaHowardBoyd about the ever expanding @educationgovuk @EnvAgency partnership delivering climate resilience in schools on the same day the #Flood strategy action plan published

A couple of important @educationgovuk actions in there. https://t.co/T6X23w4VFo
